executable.title: CalculateDataIntensityDensity
executable.description: Calculate the data intensity density of the provided radiograph.
executable.acknowledgements: The SlicerAutoscoperM developers gratefully acknowledge funding for this project provided by NIH NIAMS R01AR078924 (Multi-modal Tracking of In Vivo Skeletal Structures and Implants).

string.name: whiteRadiographDirName
string.label: White Radiograph Directory Name
string.description: Path to the directory that stores the white radiographs for the current camera, used to calculate data intensity density

float.name: outliers
float.label: DID Outliers
float.description: List of indices that fall outside of the interquartile range
